description: Fixed version with proper signature verification using ecrecover
root_cause: The withdraw function accepts signatures but does not verify them. It only checks the signature count without validating that signatures are from registered validators using ecrecover.

transformation.fix_description: Added proper signature verification using ecrecover to recover signer addresses, then validates each signer is in the validators mapping, counts valid signatures, and requires the count meets REQUIRED_SIGNATURES threshold.
transformation.why_fix_works: Proper signature verification ensures only transactions approved by registered validators can be processed, preventing unauthorized withdrawals.
